channel.title: I need coordinates to these runecrafting altars
channel.description: I'm adding runecrafting to my server and I need the coordinates to the blood altar, mind altar, soul altar, and nature altar. And I mean inside the altar, not the rock which you use a talisman on. Thanks in advance.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2009, 04:02:47 pm[/size][hr]Could someone help me out here? It's holding my programming up.

item.title: I need coordinates to these runecrafting altars
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:5, topic:277982”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=366920.msg2780524#msg2780524 date=1241817031]

Mind alter ::tele 2796,4818 Air Alter ::tele 2845,4832 Water Alter ::tele 2713,4836 Earth Alter ::tele 2660,4839 Fire Alter ::tele 2584,4836 Body Alter ::tele 2527,4833 Law Alter ::tele 2464,4834 Nature Alter ::tele 2398,4841

I am not sure if Jagex even created a blood or soul altar.

Did you type that list?
[/quote]

Nah, copy and pasted it.

Thank you so much for that. And there’s a blood and soul rift in the abyss. So where would take you?

Like I said, I am pretty sure they didn’t have one. I think I heard once that it just sends a message about not existing, but I have never seen a blood/soul altar in my life.[/quote]
ocuziwasabout2say…alterizspelldwrong.

@Topic: I don’t think there is a soul altar either.

Read full topic

Thank you so much for that. And there’s a blood and soul rift in the abyss. So where would take you?

Like I said, I am pretty sure they didn’t have one. I think I heard once that it just sends a message about not existing, but I have never seen a blood/soul altar in my life.
